body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, resident. Bavaria native. Married Nicholas Simon on May 3, 1849. Mother of Caroline Simon, John Simon, Frank Simon, Mary Simon, and S. Simon. Resident in Louisville in 1850 and 1860.
